data.author: Jose Fos

changelog.release_notes: Dropbox discontinued rendering of HTML content. Config page moved to another server.

Redesigned configuration page.
Animation of numbers now is optional.
Vibration alerts on bluetooth connection and disconnection.

Animation on start (looks great on Pebble Time)
Sometimes a number disappeared, I hope this version solve that problem

jarl 2.0 now compatible with Pebble Time !!!
4 bright colors in a color scheme created by @jamaldols
I hope it works with real hardware ;-)

Improved timing of animations (now you can read the time better when is dark)
thanks to @25p and @CarlosRM82 for their suggestions and testing
Bug fixed: when battery was below 10% the watchface crashed
Now you can select Farenheit or Celsius temperature units.

Now this watchface doesn't use any font. All numbers and characters are bitmaps made from scratch.
Temperature and weather conditions using OpenWeatherMap API
Progress bar used as a battery level indicator.
Memory leak fixed

Improved animation, now numbers appear and disappear with random directions
Fixed bitmap of number 3

Bug fixes
Configuration options: invert colors & 12H/24H format
Now date info at the shake of your wrist with a beautiful animation
Now is possible to show the date. There is an option in "settings" in your Pebble App. Reload watchface for changes to take effect.

data.description: My first watchface now for Pebble Time!. Clean and simple. jarl (the name of the watchface) is a tribute to spanish comedian Chiquito de la Calzada You can see the date, temperature and weather conditions shaking your wrist. This watchface doesn't use any font, all the numbers and characters are bitmaps made from scratch Thanks to @NachoCerrato, @rafolas, @doalvares, @jamaldols, @25p, @CarlosRM82 for their ideas and feedback

latest_release.release_notes: Dropbox discontinued rendering of HTML content. Config page moved to another server.

data.title: jarl
